languages.text: ...напустил дружину свою и на пришлецов, и на насельников монастыря, учинил кровопролитие великое и грабеж на потеху себе.

traits.locale_text: ...напустил дружину свою и на пришлецов, и на насельников монастыря, учинил кровопролитие великое и грабеж на потеху себе.

languages.text: ...unleashed {mf|his|her} armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.
languages.original_text: ...напустил дружину свою и на пришлецов, и на насельников монастыря, учинил кровопролитие великое и грабеж на потеху себе.

traits.locale_text: ...unleashed his armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

...unleashed his armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.
...unleashed his armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

languages.text: ……派遣武装部队，大肆屠杀外来者与教士。许多人惨遭杀害，无数财富遭到掠夺，供{mf|他|她}消遣。
languages.original_text: ...unleashed {mf|his|her} armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

traits.locale_text: ……派遣武装部队，大肆屠杀外来者与教士。许多人惨遭杀害，无数财富遭到掠夺，供{mf|他|她}消遣。

languages.text: ... desató sus fuerzas armadas contra tanto los monjes como los invasores, desatando una marea de sangre y saqueo para su deleite.
languages.original_text: ...unleashed {mf|his|her} armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

traits.locale_text: ... desató sus fuerzas armadas contra tanto los monjes como los invasores, desatando una marea de sangre y saqueo para su deleite.

languages.text: …流れ者に加えて修道士達にも軍隊を放ち、ただ楽しいからと、多くの血を犠牲に略奪した。
languages.original_text: ...unleashed {mf|his|her} armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

traits.locale_text: …流れ者に加えて修道士達にも軍隊を放ち、ただ楽しいからと、多くの血を犠牲に略奪した。

languages.text: ... schickte {mf|seine|ihre} Streitkräfte gegen Eindringlinge und Mönche, woraufhin zu {mf|seinem|ihrem} Vergnügen viel Blut vergossen und geplündert wurde.
languages.original_text: ...unleashed {mf|his|her} armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

traits.locale_text: ... schickte {mf|seine|ihre} Streitkräfte gegen Eindringlinge und Mönche, woraufhin zu {mf|seinem|ihrem} Vergnügen viel Blut vergossen und geplündert wurde.

languages.text: ... déchaîne ses forces armées contre les intrus et les moines sans distinction, pillant et faisant couler le sang à flot pour son plus grand plaisir.
languages.original_text: ...unleashed {mf|his|her} armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

traits.locale_text: ... déchaîne ses forces armées contre les intrus et les moines sans distinction, pillant et faisant couler le sang à flot pour son plus grand plaisir.

languages.text: ...Hem mütecavizlerin hem de keşişlerin üzerine askerî bir güç gönderdi, sırf kendi hazzı için bol bol kan döktü, bol bol talan gerçekleştirdi.
languages.original_text: ...unleashed {mf|his|her} armed force upon interlopers and monks alike, wreaking great shedding of blood and pillaging for {mf|his|her} delectation.

traits.locale_text: Hem mütecavizlerin hem de keşişlerin üzerine askerî bir güç gönderdi, sırf kendi hazzı için bol bol kan döktü, bol bol talan gerçekleştirdi.
